docs/contributing.html.title: Contributing
docs/contributing.html.body:
Contributing
Project is open for new ideas and features:

new adapters
new api functions
data source features
feedback is very matter

Source code
Source code is located in /src/ directory. Before publishing to npm code is automatically transpiled using babel and npm pre-publish hook.
Development
Use npm link feature in your projects to get up to date local bivrost code and npm run dev to start watchers for code auto transpiling.
Tests
jest - painless javascript unit testing.

npm test - execute tests + code coverage report
npm run test-dev start file system watchers

Commands

npm run dev - start watchers and transpile code with babel
npm run docs:watch - start local server with gitbook and generate html docs
